title: Internal Site Search

xdm:refinementInstances.description: Captures when a search refinement action occurs.
xdm:refinementInstances.title: Refinement Instances

xdm:term.description: Tracks the internal site search term entered by the visitor.
xdm:term.title: Term

xdm:refinementType.description: Captures the refinement type(s) applied to the search results (i.e. department, brand, price, in-store, review rating, color, material, etc.)
xdm:refinementType.title: Refinement Type

xdm:radiusDistance.description: Captures the selected distance of the search radius.
xdm:radiusDistance.title: Radius Distance

xdm:autoCompleteClicked.description: Indicates when a visitor uses a suggested/autocompleted search value to execute the search
xdm:autoCompleteClicked.title: Auto Complete Clicked

xdm:resultsPageNumber.description: For paginated search results, tracks the page of results the visitor is viewing.
xdm:resultsPageNumber.title: Results Page Number

xdm:radiusType.description: Captures the selected distance type of the search radius in either miles or kilometers.
xdm:radiusType.title: Radius Type

xdm:productFindingMethods.description: The internal site search term value with merchandising binding. Will show what term was searched for immediately before viewing a product.
xdm:productFindingMethods.title: Product Finding Method

xdm:postalCode.description: Captures the zip code used for a search, if applicable
xdm:postalCode.title: Postal Code

xdm:instances.description: Number of times an internal site search has occurred.
xdm:instances.title: Instances

xdm:numberOfResults.description: Count of the total number of search results returned.
xdm:numberOfResults.title: Number of Results

xdm:refinementValue.description: Number of times an internal site search refinement has occurred.
xdm:refinementValue.title: Refinement Value

xdm:autoCompleteValue.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This value is used to track the specific terms clicked
xdm:autoCompleteValue.title: Auto Complete Value

xdm:nullInstances.description: Number of times an internal site search has occurred that provided zero results.
xdm:nullInstances.title: Null Instances

xdm:autoCompleteTypedValue.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This value tracks what the user started to type in order to generate the specific set of suggested search terms
xdm:autoCompleteTypedValue.title: Auto Complete Typed Value

xdm:locationInPage.description: When multiple search boxes exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used to search
xdm:locationInPage.title: Location in Page

xdm:resultsPerPage.description: For paginated search results, tracks the number of search results displayed per page.
xdm:resultsPerPage.title: Results Per Page

xdm:searchType.description: Captures the method of search being executed, if applicable. Examples could include a type-ahead search, directly-typed search, or any other type of custom search functionality a site might have.
xdm:searchType.title: Search Type

xdm:sortType.description: Captures the type of sort applied to search results, i.e. best match, price, rating, etc.
xdm:sortType.title: Sort Type
